00020 #ifndef RDK2_RAGENT_MODULE_CONFIG
00021 #define RDK2_RAGENT_MODULE_CONFIG
00022 
00023 #include <map>
00024 
00025 #include <rdkcore/rgeometry/rpoint2i.h>
00026 #include <rdkcore/repository_struct/property.h>
00027 
00028 #include "pair.h"
00029 
00030 namespace RDK2 { namespace RAgent {
00031 
00032 using namespace RDK2::Containers;
00033 using namespace RDK2::RGeometry;
00034 using namespace std;
00035 using namespace RDK2::RepositoryNS;
00036 
00037 class ModuleConfig: public RDK2::Object  {
00038 public:
00039     string moduleName;
00040     string library;
00041     RPoint2i visualConfigPosition;
00042 
00043 protected:
00044     void parseTextConfig(cstr textConfig);  // called from read to fill the following structures
00045     string prepareTextConfigForSave() const;    // called from write to create the text config to save
00046 
00047 public:// FIXME should be protected
00048     // read() fills these, and you need to fill these before calling write()
00049     map<string, string> textObjConfigs;     // objects loaded from and to save to textual representation
00050     PropertyList objConfigs;                // objects loaded from and to save to xml
00051     map<string, set<string> > userOptions;  // user options loaded from and to save to textual config
00052     map<string, string> descriptions;       // descriptions (to be set only before save)
00053     
00054 public:
00055     ModuleConfig() { }
00056     void setLibrary(string s){library=s;}
00057     void setModuleName(string s){moduleName=s;}
00058     void read(Reader*r) throw (ReadingException);
00059     void write(Writer*w) const throw (WritingException);
00060     RDK2_DEFAULT_CLONE(ModuleConfig);
00061 };
00062 
00063 typedef RDK2::Containers::Vector<ModuleConfig> ModuleConfigVector;
00064 
00065 }} // namespace RDK2::RAgent
